thread.title_full: Jennifer Ellison flaunts new slim figure in sports bra | Daily Mail Online

author: Jasmin Sahota For Mailonline
title: Jennifer Ellison flaunts new slim figure in sports bra | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 275 shares 'And today I felt brave enough to take a pic after training without a big baggy top over!!! I've gone from a size 18 to a 10 in just over 3 months! 'I still have a long way to go to get back to what I was was but 2 stone lighter and 27 inches of body fat later I'm feeling SOOOO much better! Flashback Friday: Dropping a whopping four dress sizes in just over three months, the actress gushed over her impressive achievement, declaring she is 'so proud' 'Thanks to the most amazing trainer ever Tony Swift for keeping our sessions amazing and challenging and to my training partner Rob Tickle who's absolutely smashing the results too!' And the mother-of-three definitely ensured her incredible figure has on full display as she donned a skintight sports bra which clung to her plentiful cleavage. Teamed with form-fitting leggings, Jennifer paraded her long and lean pins while her pert posterior was perfectly accentuated in the simple gym selfie. In keeping with her exercise theme, the blonde beauty shunned all traces of make-up allowing her flawless complexion to shine through. Transformation: The actress appeared on Loose Women last month, she admitted at her heaviest she weighted 14 stones but wanted to get out of her 'self-destruct mode' Give them the cold shoulder in Jennifer's jumper dress by AllSaints Â£128
